title.rendered: HOW GMCI CALCIUM CARBONATE PROVIDES MORE THAN JUST OPACITY

content.rendered:
[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”section” _builder_version=”3.22″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row admin_label=”row” _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Text” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” global_colors_info=”{}”]

INTRODUCTION

GMCI Calcium Carbonate has come in handy, and for the fact that it covers 4 percent of the Earth’s surface, it is ideal for beauty purposes. Calcium Carbonate uses varies from industry to industry,  like paper, paints, inks, pharmaceuticals, and many more, only due to its chalky flavor, fine White powder, and fragrance. Global paper production was estimated at 413 million tons in 2017 compared to 409 in 2016, where the major paper countries were Germany, the US, China, and Japan. With the increase of paper and paper board production will also increase the demand for Calcium Carbonate because it is applied as a coating on the paper to incorporate brightness and opacity. 

                           CALCIUM CARBONATE COVERS 4 PERCENT OF THE SURFACE OF THE EARTH

CALCIUM CARBONATE VS CALCIUM CITRATE

The most concentrated form of Calcium is Calcium Carbonate, which is found in Caltrate. Calcium supplements we get in the pharmaceuticals are either made out of Calcium Carbonate or Calcium Citrate, out of which Calcium Carbonate is the most concentrated form. Calcium Carbonate can provide twice the volume of elemental Calcium given out by Calcium Citrate whereas Calcium Citrate can only give out half of the elemental calcium than that given by Calcium Carbonate. Calcium Carbonate can also be produced as a smaller sized tablet, whereas Calcium Citrate requires larger sized tablet to get the amount of elemental calcium.

      CALCIUM CARBONATE SUPPLEMENTS

CALCITE OR CALCIUM CARBONATE POWDER

Ninety-nine percent of the Calcium Carbonate is Calcite super White Material, mainly found in insecticides and paints. The Calcium Carbonate formula is CaCO3 . Calcium Carbonate forms the Calcite powder   or the Calcium Carbonate powder   has been the prime requisite in Plastics, metal polish, cement, and calcium carbide. Calcium carbonate has been a demanding mineral globally to which we cater to comprehensively, and meet the foreign standards. This superior quality of Calcium Carbonate has also managed to keep its compatibility, due to which we stay long-lasting ties with firms around the world and our customers.

                                      

        CALCIUM CARBONATE POWDER

CALCIUM CARBONATE SIDE EFFECTS AND USES

Calcium Carbonate forms the White Powder, and it is due to its soft, chalky powdered texture that it is a bit dusty and is slightly soluble in water. Calcium Carbonate acts as a significant oil absorber and a mattifying ingredient and price friendly, which is why most of the cosmetic and skincare products have Calcium Carbonate in them and makes it an oil-control work. Still, one needs to be very careful when applying around the eyes as it is high in PH. Calcium Carbonate is also found as a mild abrasive in toothpaste. Calcium Carbonate has been a highly demanded mineral, especially for beauty products. It gives fillers to lipsticks, eye shadow, foundation, face powder, and facial masks, and is used to formulate dry shampoo and solid stick deodorants. Calcium Carbonate may be found in food, but medication is where everyone has to be careful and ensure they consult with a pharmacist, before they use it. The major Calcium Carbonate Side effects, could hamper your urinal, rapidly gain weight, and high levels of calcium in your blood could also lead to constipation, vomiting, thirst, nausea, bone pain, frequently feeling tired and mostly devoid of energy. Calcium Carbonate antacid helps in relieving acid indigestion, heartburn and stomach upset is available in with or without prescription. Any medicine without prescription is prone to vulnerability and same goes for Calcium Carbonate Antacid which can lead to side effects like gas, constipation and frequent burping, if not consulted by a pharmacist.

COUNTRIES WHERE CALCIUM CARBONATE IS AT A STAGERRING DEMAND

France, Singapore, United States, South Korea, Japan, Germany, Hong Kong, and China are the top cosmetic producing countries that augmented the demand for Calcium Carbonate. Although they have their Calcium Carbonate, our excellent quality-price compatible with Calcium Carbonate is expected to increase demand in the next few years. France is the top cosmetic trading country globally with a valuation of 10 Billion Dollars worth of exports of the 16 percent total beauty cosmetics and skincare exports.

MARKET SIZE OF CALCIUM  CARBONATE AND FORECAST

The Market Size of Calcium Carbonate worldwide was valued at 22.95 billion Dollars in 2018, and an estimated 7.4 percent CAGR from 2019 to 2025. It is due to an increase in demand for paper products utilized for hygiene and packaging that has  lead to the growth of the market, and the market size is expected to reach 37.75 billion dollars by 2025 according to the new report of Grand View Research, expanding at a CAGR 7.4 percent.[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
